actions.message:
{% set ticket = var_ticket|first %}
We recently resolved your issue: **{{ticket.subject}}**

To what extent do you agree or disagree with the following statement:

### The {{{product_name}}} team made it easy to resolve my issue.

actions.options:
Strongly Disagree
Disagree
Somewhat Disagree
Undecided
Somewhat Agree
Agree
Strongly Agree
